dcterms:description: The Human Connectome Project (HCP) dataset provides high-quality neuroimaging data, including diffusion MRI scans, which are essential for studying brain connectivity and function.
dcterms:title: Human Connectome Project (HCP) dataset

dcterms:creator: J. Wasserthal
P. Neher
K.H. Maier-Hein
dcterms:description: TractSeg is a fast and accurate method for white matter tract segmentation, utilizing convolutional neural networks to process diffusion MRI data.
dcterms:title: TractSeg

dcterms:creator: M.F. Glasser
S.N. Sotiropoulos
J.A. Wilson
T.S. Coalson

J.L. Andersson

M. Webster
M. Polimeni
J.R. Van Essen
M. Jenkinson
dcterms:description: The dMRI scans from the HCP dataset are used for evaluating segmentation methods, providing a comprehensive set of diffusion-weighted images for analysis.
dcterms:title: dMRI scans (used in the context of the HCP dataset)
